StoryText: I'm supposed to go home for dinner but both %FullName:NPC:1% and %FullName:NPC:2% invite me to dinners with them separately.
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Go home for dinner and save my money.

OptionResult.Result: We go to a barbecue place and it's delicious and so bad for you. Both %FullName:NPC:2% and %Full:Name:NPC:3% are disappointed I didn't have dinner with them.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:3% is upset I didn't come home for dinner. %FullName:NPC:2% is upset I didn't take %Pron:2:2% up on %Pron:2:2% offer. Everybody, I can only be one place at a time! At least me and %FullName:NPC:1% had a great time! Oh, but I feel so fat now.

OptionResult.Result: %FullName:NPC:3% and %FullName:NPC:1% both understand that I want to go out with %FullName:NPC:2% and aren't mad. We eat at a great French restaurant but it is expensive!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Wow, me and %FullName:NPC:2% had an amazing time! I'm so glad I went with %Pron:2:2%. The food was delicious, very fattening though. And quite expensive. I didn't realize I would be spending so much money. But I guess it's worth it.

OptionResult.Result: Both %FullName:NPC:1% and %FullName:NPC:2% understand and both say we should plan for another time. %FullName:NPC:3% makes a healthy and delicious dinner for us and we have a nice night.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:3% is happy I still came home for dinner and actually I am too. I saved money and didn't spend a bunch eating out. And our dinner was really healthy and still tasty. I didn't feel so tired and out of it after dinner, I felt good! I should probably eat like this more often.
